title: Drawing, "High Point: A New Plan for Living", ca. 1936
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on thick paper
signed: Signed in blue gouache, lower right: E. McK. K.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Sky with white clouds above a modern apartment dwelling showin in outline. Left: HIGH / POINT; below: A NEW PLAN FOR LIVING.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "High Point: A New Plan for Living", ca. 1936.
ca. 1936. Brush and gouache, graphite on thick paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-703.
